text: “Ndipo, ku Madiyan tidamtuma m’bale wawo Shuaib, iye adati: “E inu anthu anga! Pembedzani Allah; mulibe mulungu wina koma Iye. Ndipo musachepetse mulingo wa mbale ndi wasikelo (powapimira anthu), ine ndikukuonani kuti ndinu opeza bwino, ndipo ndikukuoperani chilango cha tsiku (lalikulu) lomwe lidzakuzingani.”
